Name: bofhland/cracked-url
Description: Spam URLs.

Name: bofhland/malware-attach
Description: Malware hashes.

Name: bofhland/malware-url
Description: Malware URLs.

Name: bofhland/phishing-url
Description: Phishing URLs.

Name: oitc/winnow/attachments
Description: Spammed attachments such as .pdf, .doc, .rtf, and .zip.

Name: oitc/winnow/bad-cw
Description: MD5 hashes of malware attachments acquired directly from a group of botnets.

Name: oitc/winnow/complex-patterns
Description: Contain hand generated signatures for malware and some egregious fraud.

Name: oitc/winnow/extended-malware
Description: contain hand generated signatures for malware.

Name: oitc/winnow/extended-malware-links
Description: Contain hand generated signatures for malware links.

Name: oitc/winnow/malware
Description: Current virus, trojan, and other malware not yet detected by ClamAV.

Name: oitc/winnow/malware-links
Description: Links to malware.

Name: oitc/winnow/phish-complete-url
Description: Phishing and other malicious URLs and compromised hosts, entire URLs are used.

Name: oitc/winnow/spam-complete
Description: Detect fraud and other malicious spam.

Name: porcupine/phishtank
Description: Online and valid phishing URLs from phishtank.com data feed.

Name: porcupine/porcupine-ndb
Description: Brazilian email phishing and malware signatures.

Name: porcupine/porcupine-hsb
Description: SHA256 hashes of VBS and JSE malware, kept for 7 days.

Name: sanesecurity/badmacro
Description: Blocks dangerous macros embedded in Excel, JS, RTF, Word, and XML files.

Name: sanesecurity/blurl
Description: Blocklisted full URLs over the last 7 days, covering malware, phishing, and spam; URLs added only when main signatures have failed to detect but are known to be "bad".

Name: sanesecurity/foxhole/filename
Description: Block certain commonly known malware filenames within .zip, .rar, .7z, .arj, and .cab archives.

Name: sanesecurity/foxhole/generic
Description: Block double extensions of certain dangerous filetypes that are contained within .zip, .rar, .7z, .arj, and .cab files; These files will be detected only if they end in dangerous filestypes such as .pif, .scr, .exe, .com, .bat, .cmd, .vbs, .lnk, .cpl, and .vb.

Name: sanesecurity/foxhole/js-cdb
Description: Block most JavaScript (.js) files within .zip and .rar archived; The current locky JavaScript malware is using rapidly changing JavaScript files and this database is aimed at blocking these; To help minimise false positives, this database will only scan small sized .zip and .rar files.

Name: sanesecurity/foxhole/js-ndb
Description: Block all JavaScript (.js) files within .gzip and .ace archives; The current locky JavaScript malware is using rapidly changing JavaScript files and this database is aimed at blocking these.

Name: sanesecurity/hackingteam
Description: Hacking Team hashes converted to ClamAV format (based on work by rooksecurity.com).

Name: sanesecurity/junk
Description: General high hitting junk, containing 419s, jobs, lottery, phishing, spam, etc..

Name: sanesecurity/jurlbl
Description: Junk URL based.

Name: sanesecurity/jurlbla
Description: Junk URL based autogenerated from various feeds.

Name: sanesecurity/lott
Description: Lottery.

Name: sanesecurity/malwarehash
Description: Malware hashes without known sized.

Name: sanesecurity/phish
Description: Malware and phishing.

Name: sanesecurity/rogue
Description: Fake codecs, malware, rogue anti-virus software, etc..

Name: sanesecurity/shelter
Description: Malware and phishing.
